game.name: Sling Drifter
game.description:
It is time to show off your ultimate drifting skills in our brand new racing challenge! Are you ready friends to drift your vehicle like never before? Join Sling Drifter and be prepared to drift around the bends by applying your knowledge about sling physics! Your job is to put your finger on your mouse or tap the screen of your mobile phone to control how the vehicle turns. Make sure to attach your line to a pole and apply it to slingshot your vehicle around the corners. 

The best part is that your vehicle will accelerate automatically and you only need to maintain its balance when it takes a turn. Collect the cash that you see on your way while moving your car forward in this HTML5 car drifting game! Try to collect as much money as possible to unlock new vehicles to make your gameplay interesting! There are many amazing and exciting rewards and challenges are waiting for you during the gameplay. Unlock new car models and different race modes to have extra fun!

Put your drifting and driving abilities to the test to go as far as you can go to become a master of the sling drift! This fast-paced car driving game includes plenty of new car models to unlock, seamless gameplay, easy controls and an unlockable race mode. Complete multiple challenges to earn rewards and achievements in this physics-based endless car drifting game! Browse through our extensive collection of free racing games that are worth playing to kill your boredom, no download required!
